pageContext.claim: “I don't know about it. I mean, you're telling me something I don't know about. We have a lot of ads. And they certainly are effective, based on the numbers that we're seeing....Well, a lot of things are offensive. Your questions are offensive a lot of times -- so, you know.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump was asked about the widely-reported fact that networks were refusing to air his campaign ad that was denounced as racist. (It falsely claimed that Democrats allowed a police-killing illegal immigrant into the United States.) It's simply not credible that an avid TV-watcher like Trump would be unaware of the controversy.
